SELECT R.RESV_NO, TO_CHAR(R.RESV_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') || ' ' || R.RESV_TIME AS RESV_DATETIME, B.BABY_NAME, B.BABY_REGNO1, B.BABY_NO, R.RESV_ROOM FROM RESERVATION R, BABY B WHERE R.BABY_NO = B.BABY_NO
AND TO_CHAR(R.RESV_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND B.BABY_NAME LIKE '%${keyword}%'
ORDER BY R.RESV_NO, R.RESV_TYPE

SELECT P.PAY_NO, TO_CHAR(P.PAY_DATE, 'YYMMDD') AS PAY_DATE, P.PAY_PRICE, P.PAY_STATE, B.*, D.RESV_NO FROM PAYMENT P, DIAGNOSIS D, RESERVATION R, BABY B WHERE P.DIAG_NO = D.DIAG_NO AND D.RESV_NO = R.RESV_NO AND R.BABY_NO = B.BABY_NO AND P.PAY_STATE IN('N', 'W')
AND TO_CHAR(P.PAY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND B.BABY_NAME LIKE '%${keyword}%'
ORDER BY R.RESV_NO, R.RESV_TYPE
